entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Thursday 13 April 2023
